preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: Conventions is an integrator framework of Java EE technologies with the objective to easy the development of enterprise rich web applications. The framework leverages other frameworks such as Hibernate, Primefaces and CODI to delivery solutions to common problems like cruding, exception handling, true pagination, helper UI components, internationalization, annotated queries etc...

This guide is divided into a getting started to setup the framework plus three parts, the first one walks through the framework architecture, the second part shows general utility components such as annotated queries, i18n, exception handling etc... finaly the last part is reserved to Conventions Scaffolding a code generation tool for Conventions based on JBoss Forge.
